statements: SELECT * FROM remote_work_productivity_data;
SELECT username, productivity_score FROM remote_work_productivity_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, activity_time, productivity_score FROM remote_work_productivity_data ORDER BY productivity_score DESC;
SELECT username, activity_time FROM remote_work_productivity_data WHERE productivity_score > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM remote_work_productivity_data LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM remote_work_productivity_data WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT username, productivity_score FROM remote_work_productivity_data WHERE productivity_score > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM remote_work_productivity_data WHERE activity_time BETWEEN '2021-07-01' AND '2021-07-31' ORDER BY productivity_score DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT productivity_score FROM remote_work_productivity_data WHERE username LIKE 'J%';
SELECT user_id, username, DATE(activity_time), productivity_score FROM remote_work_productivity_data WHERE productivity_score >= 0.7 ORDER BY activity_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM remote_work_data WHERE employee_id = 123 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, date, hours_worked FROM remote_work_data WHERE productivity_rating > 3;
SELECT MIN(hours_worked), MAX(hours_worked), AVG(productivity_rating) FROM remote_work_data;
SELECT entry_id, employee_id, date FROM remote_work_data WHERE productivity_rating IS NULL;
SELECT process_name, optimization_strategy FROM workflow_optimization ORDER BY analysis_id;
SELECT * FROM remote_work_data WHERE productivity_rating > 7 ORDER BY date DESC, hours_worked ASC
SELECT employee_id, date, SUM(hours_worked) AS total_hours_worked FROM remote_work_data GROUP BY employee_id, date HAVING total_hours_worked > 8 ORDER BY employee_id
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(DISTINCT date) AS working_days_count FROM remote_work_data GROUP BY employee_id HAVING working_days_count >= 5
SELECT entry_id, employee_id, date, hours_worked, productivity_rating FROM remote_work_data WHERE hours_worked >= 8 AND productivity_rating > 5 ORDER BY productivity_rating DESC
SELECT process_name, COUNT(*) AS analysis_count FROM workflow_optimization GROUP BY process_name HAVING analysis_count >= 2 ORDER BY analysis_count DESC
SELECT * FROM productivity_data;
SELECT user_id, productivity_score, date FROM productivity_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM projects ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT user_id, MAX(productivity_score) AS max_score FROM productivity_data GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE position = 'Manager'
SELECT project_name, manager_id FROM projects ORDER BY project_name DESC
SELECT user_id, AVG(productivity_score) AS avg_productivity FROM productivity_data GROUP BY user_id
SELECT user_id, username, position, project_name FROM users JOIN projects ON users.user_id = projects.manager_id
SELECT * FROM project WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM project WHERE end_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT task_name FROM task WHERE project_id = 1 ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM task_assignment WHERE assigned_date >= '2022-01-01' AND completion_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM project;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT project_name, task_name, task_description FROM project p JOIN task t ON p.project_id = t.project_id;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee WHERE position = 'Manager';

SELECT t.task_name, e.employee_name FROM task_assignment ta JOIN task t ON ta.task_id = t.task_id JOIN employee e ON ta.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE ta.completion_date IS NULL ORDER BY ta.assigned_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM remote_work_teams;
SELECT team_name, team_leader FROM remote_work_teams ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, productivity_score FROM employee WHERE productivity_score > 80;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM tasks WHERE deadline >= '2022-06-15';

SELECT employee.employee_name, tasks.task_name, task_assignments.completion_status FROM employee JOIN task_assignments ON employee.employee_id = task_assignments.employee_id JOIN tasks ON task_assignments.task_id = tasks.task_id;
SELECT * FROM remote_work_teams WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT team_name, team_leader FROM remote_work_teams ORDER BY team_name ASC;

SELECT t.task_name, ta.completion_status, e.employee_name FROM tasks t JOIN task_assignments ta ON t.task_id = ta.task_id JOIN employee e ON ta.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE t.deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT e.employee_name, p.log_timestamp FROM employee e JOIN productivity_logs p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id WHERE e.productivity_score > 80 ORDER BY p.log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT team_name, COUNT(e.employee_id) AS total_employees FROM remote_work_teams t JOIN employee e ON t.team_id = e.team_id GROUP BY team_name HAVING total_employees >= 5;
